data.text:
Whether you’re working on a school project or trying to increase your Christmas vocabulary, we can help. Below is a list of popular Christmas words that you can use for lessons, crosswords, word searches, and more.

Table of Contents

Below is a list of common Christmas words. For more words, see the “Christmas Food” word list below.

Christmas Phrases

Merry Christmas

Happy Holidays!

“Ho, ho, ho!” – Santa Claus

Season’s Greetings!

Feliz Navidad (Merry Christmas in Spanish)

Season’s Greetings

Keep calm and jingle all the way

Christmas is coming

We wish you a merry Christmas

Santa Claus is coming to town

It’s the most wonderful time of the year!

Jingle bells, jingle bells, jingle all the way.

Naughty or Nice

Goodwill To Men

Sleigh bells ring

Joy to the world

Away in a manger

You’ll shoot your eye out, kid. (from A Christmas Story)

Merry Christmas To All, And To All, A Good Night!

I Saw Mommy Kissing Santa Claus

Deck the halls with boughs of holly, fa la la la la, la la la la.

Don’t forget to leave Santa a cookie and glass of milk.
